creditline: Gift of the Federation of Nigeria as a symbol of Nigerian-American Goodwill
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Tapestry, yellow, red, green and white on black fringed ground. The designs of Akwete are symbolic of the religious beliefs, culture and traditions of the people. Hand woven.
dimension:
43 1/4 x 77 1/4 in. (109.86 x 196.22 cm)
4 in. (10.16 cm) (single element, fringe)
title: Tapestry
